description:
#Chinainsights#Chinanews
On March 1, 2024, the Chinese government introduced a new regulation that shocked the courier and logistics industry. Courier and logistics companies nationwide have been overwhelmed by shipments stranded in terminals or transfer stations. In this episode, we’ll explore the reasons and consequences behind this phenomenon. 
First, let's look at the phenomenon of China's courier service coming to a standstill. 

Have questions? Do you have something to share with us about China? We want to hear from you!

title: A new regulation on courier service has devastated tens of millions of courier workers in China
